NAOqi Camera

Parameters:

  • resolution (CameraResolution) – NAOqi Camera Resolution
  • rate (int) – NAOqi Camera Rate
  • callbacks (list of callable) – On Image Event Callbacks
  • index (int) – Which NAOqi Camera to use
